verses.verse: Then I looked, <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> in <S%H413><s%> the firmament <S%H7549><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was above <S%H5921><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> there appeared <S%H7200><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them as it were a sapphire <S%H5601><s%> stone, <S%H68><s%> as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of a throne. <S%H3678><s%>

And he spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> with linen, <S%H906><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Go in <S%H935><s%> <S%H413><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the wheels, <S%H1534><s%> even under <S%H8478><s%> the cherub, <S%H3742><s%> and fill <S%H4390><s%> thine hand <S%H2651><s%> with coals <S%H1513><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> from between <S%H4480><s%> <S%H996><s%> the cherubims, <S%H3742><s%> and scatter <S%H2236><s%> them over <S%H5921><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%> And he went <S%H935><s%> in in my sight. <S%H5869><s%>

Now the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> on the right side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3225><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> when the man <S%H376><s%> went in; <S%H935><s%> and the cloud <S%H6051><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the inner <S%H6442><s%> <S%H853><s%> court. <S%H2691><s%>

Then the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> went up <S%H7311><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the cherub, <S%H3742><s%> and stood over <S%H5921><s%> the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the house; <S%H1004><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and the court <S%H2691><s%> was full <S%H4390><s%> of <S%H854><s%> the brightness <S%H5051><s%> of the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> glory. <S%H3519><s%>

And the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the cherubims' <S%H3742><s%> wings <S%H3671><s%> was heard <S%H8085><s%> even to <S%H5704><s%> the outer <S%H2435><s%> court, <S%H2691><s%> as the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> God <S%H410><s%> when he speaketh. <S%H1696><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that when he had commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> with linen, <S%H906><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> from between <S%H4480><s%> <S%H996><s%> the wheels, <S%H1534><s%> from between <S%H4480><s%> <S%H996><s%> the cherubims; <S%H3742><s%> then he went in, <S%H935><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the wheels. <S%H212><s%>

And one cherub <S%H3742><s%> stretched forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> from between <S%H4480><s%> <S%H996><s%> the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was between <S%H996><s%> the cherubims, <S%H3742><s%> and took <S%H5375><s%> thereof, and put <S%H5414><s%> it into <S%H413><s%> the hands <S%H2651><s%> of him that was clothed <S%H3847><s%> with linen: <S%H906><s%> who took <S%H3947><s%> it, and went out. <S%H3318><s%>
And there appeared <S%H7200><s%> in the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> the form <S%H8403><s%> of a man's <S%H120><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> their wings. <S%H3671><s%>

And when I looked, <S%H7200><s%> behold <S%H2009><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> wheels <S%H212><s%> by <S%H681><s%> the cherubims, <S%H3742><s%> one <S%H259><s%> wheel <S%H212><s%> by <S%H681><s%> one <S%H259><s%> cherub, <S%H3742><s%> and another <S%H259><s%> wheel <S%H212><s%> by <S%H681><s%> another <S%H259><s%> cherub: <S%H3742><s%> and the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the wheels <S%H212><s%> was as the color <S%H5869><s%> of a beryl <S%H8658><s%> stone. <S%H68><s%>

And as for their appearances, <S%H4758><s%> they four <S%H702><s%> had one <S%H259><s%> likeness, <S%H1823><s%> as if <S%H834><s%> a wheel <S%H212><s%> had been <S%H1961><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of a wheel. <S%H212><s%>

When they went, <S%H1980><s%> they went <S%H1980><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> their four <S%H702><s%> sides; <S%H7253><s%> they turned <S%H5437><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> as they went, <S%H1980><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> looked <S%H6437><s%> they followed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> it; they turned <S%H5437><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> as they went. <S%H1980><s%>

And their whole <S%H3605><s%> body, <S%H1320><s%> and their backs, <S%H1354><s%> and their hands, <S%H3027><s%> and their wings, <S%H3671><s%> and the wheels, <S%H212><s%> were full <S%H4392><s%> of eyes <S%H5869><s%> round about, <S%H5439><s%> even the wheels <S%H212><s%> that they four <S%H702><s%> had.
As for the wheels, <S%H212><s%> it was cried <S%H7121><s%> unto them in my hearing, <S%H241><s%> O wheel. <S%H1534><s%>

And every one <S%H259><s%> had four <S%H702><s%> faces: <S%H6440><s%> the first <S%H259><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> was the face <S%H6440><s%> of a cherub, <S%H3742><s%> and the second <S%H8145><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> was the face <S%H6440><s%> of a man, <S%H120><s%> and the third <S%H7992><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of a lion, <S%H738><s%> and the fourth <S%H7243><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of an eagle. <S%H5404><s%>

And the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> were lifted up. <S%H7426><s%> This <S%H1931><s%> is the living creature <S%H2416><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> of Chebar. <S%H3529><s%>

And when the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> went, <S%H1980><s%> the wheels <S%H212><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> by <S%H681><s%> them: and when the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%> to mount up <S%H7311><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> the same <S%H1992><s%> wheels <S%H212><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> turned <S%H5437><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> from beside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H681><s%> them.

When they stood, <S%H5975><s%> these stood; <S%H5975><s%> and when they were lifted up, <S%H7311><s%> these lifted up <S%H7426><s%> themselves also: for <S%H3588><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the living creature <S%H2416><s%> was in them.

Then the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> departed <S%H3318><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the cherubims. <S%H3742><s%>

And the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> their wings, <S%H3671><s%> and mounted up <S%H7426><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> in my sight: <S%H5869><s%> when they went out, <S%H3318><s%> the wheels <S%H212><s%> also were beside <S%H5980><s%> them, and every one stood <S%H5975><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the east <S%H6931><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> house; <S%H1004><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was over <S%H5921><s%> them above. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%>

This <S%H1931><s%> is the living creature <S%H2416><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> of Chebar; <S%H3529><s%> and I knew <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> were the cherubims. <S%H3742><s%>

Every one <S%H259><s%> had four faces apiece, <S%H702><s%> <S%H702><s%> <S%H6440><s%> and every one <S%H259><s%> four <S%H702><s%> wings; <S%H3671><s%> and the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> was under <S%H8478><s%> their wings. <S%H3671><s%>

And the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of their faces <S%H6440><s%> was the same <S%H1992><s%> faces <S%H6440><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%> of Chebar, <S%H3529><s%> their appearances <S%H4758><s%> and themselves: they went <S%H1980><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> straight forward. <S%H413><s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H6440><s%>
